C -500 100 100 		1 0 0 	100
L 0 200 100 	0.7
pl 0 400 0 		0 -1 0 		50 50 225
pl 0 -400 0 	0 1 0 		255 0 225
pl 0 0 400		 0 0 -1 	50 225 50
pl 0 0 -400 	0 0 1 		50 225 50
sp 100 0 0 			40 		255 0 0
sp 150 100 100 		40 		0 0 255
sp 200 -100 -100 	40 		255 0 0
sp 250 -100 100 	40 		0 0 255
sp 300 0 200 		40 		0 255 0
sp 350 200 0 		40 		0 255 0
